conversations.content: What is the title of the news article published on Oct 16, 2024?
The title of the news article published on Oct 16, 2024 is 'To support the Resistance, we will be where we need to be!'
What is the current state of the Zionist regime according to the article?

According to the article, the Zionist regime is not in good shape these days and has fallen into the corner of the ring. They see the Abraham Accords as completely out of reach and view the Resistance Front as more unified and bolder than before.
What did the Zionist regime think after assassinating Resistance leaders?

The Zionist regime thought that they had cut off the connection between the Resistance and the Islamic Republic with the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran and Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut. They were roaring and talking about a New Middle East and a new order.
What role did the US play in the negotiations?
The US, which was playing from behind the Zionists, had assumed the role of broker in the negotiations and tried to delay the response of the Resistance Front with false promises.
What did the Zionists assume about the Resistance Front?
The Zionists assumed that the Resistance Front had become passive, which led them to begin talking about bigger assassinations and opening new fronts.
What was the significance of Operation True Promise II?

Operation True Promise II marked the start of a new era in the region, as Iranian missiles opened the door to this new era. Iran’s subsequent actions caused the Zionists' pipe dream to turn into a tragedy of inaction and confusion.
What did the Zionists do after several acts of strength by Iran?

The Zionists threw in the towel after several acts of strength by Iran, and now they only prance about in the fields of blind assassinations and baseless propaganda, which will soon lose their effectiveness and expose their empty hand to the world.
What message did Iranian missiles send to Tel Aviv in Act I: True Promise?

Iranian missiles sent a clear message directly to Tel Aviv: 'The era of hit-and-run is over!' This message was dictated by the raining down of missiles on the entire occupied territories, making the Zionists understand that the Islamic Republic of Iran could reach every part of the occupied territories.
What was the impact of Iran's missile display on the Zionists' missile defense shield?

The weak and disappointing display of the Zionists' missile defense shield sent the message to others that the propaganda of the impenetrability of the Zionist regime’s sky is nothing more than a promotional maneuver. The Zionists are now more afraid of Yemeni, Lebanese, and Iraqi missiles and drones than in the past.
What was Iran's message regarding the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh?

Iran's message was clear: In addition to Iran’s territorial integrity, which is a red line, the assassination of a guest of the Iranian nation, Ismail Haniyeh, was also an unforgivable act by the Zionists. The Islamic Republic declared that it seeks vengeance for the assassination of its guest, and the more brazen the enemy acts, the more serious and firmer the Islamic Republic will be in response.
What did the Zionists resort to after losing the upper hand in the field?

The Zionists, who had lost the upper hand in the field, resorted to a game of psychological pressure — a dirty game that they indeed know better than fighting — and that was the threat of assassination and attack in the heart of Iran. They said that they were targeting Tehran and had all options on the table.
What was the significance of the Nasr Friday Prayer led by the Supreme Leader?

The Nasr Friday Prayer led by the Supreme Leader on October 4 was a significant event that caused a bigger shock to the body of the Zionist regime than the missiles of Operation True Promise. It showed that not only the Zionist regime is not capable of defending itself, but it is also not what it claims to be in offense either. The intimidation strategy pursued by the Zionists suffered a heavy defeat on this day.
What message did the Supreme Leader's presence at the Nasr Friday Prayer send?

The Supreme Leader's presence at the Nasr Friday Prayer sent a clear message: Now that the commander-in-chief is in the middle of the field, there will be no shelter anywhere. The Zionists saw that those who had threatened not only did not hide like themselves, but also held a memorial for the Sayyid al-Shuhada of the Resistance in the open air, their leader delivered long sermons and also performed the non-obligatory acts of prayer, performed the Asr [late afternoon] prayer after the Friday Prayer in an uncustomary act, and prolonged his presence in Mosalla.
Who was the first to convey the message of the strength and integrity of the Islamic Republic of Iran?

Abbas Araghchi was the first to convey the message of the strength and integrity of the Islamic Republic of Iran under the leadership of Sayyid Ali Khamenei. He flew to Lebanon almost at the same time as the Friday Prayer was led by Imam Khamenei in Mosalla of Tehran, even though the area around the Beirut airport was bombed a few hours before his landing.
What was the purpose of Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian's visit to Qatar?

Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian went to Qatar while being escorted by Phantom fighter jets to convey the message of the strength of the Islamic Republic. He also stressed that Iran was entirely by the side of the Resistance Front in a firm conversation with various world media outlets in order to destroy the Zionists’ design for the New Middle East.
What did Iran's foreign minister do to pursue diplomacy on the field?

Iran's foreign minister went to Lebanon and Syria to pursue diplomacy on the field and show who has the upper hand. The Zionist regime, which does not hesitate to invade the territory of any country, wanted to target Araghchi in Lebanon, but was not able to. They knew that the next action of the Islamic Republic will imperil their existence.
What did the Speaker of the Majlis do on October 12, 2024?

The Speaker of the Majlis, Mohammad Baqer Qalibaf, in a brave act on October 12, 2024, personally flew an Airbus aircraft from the hangar of the Islamic Republic to Beirut. He visited the areas that were brutally bombed by the Zionist regime and had a face-to-face conversation with people whom the enemy media apparatus had been trying to convince that the Islamic Republic had abandoned them.
What message did the Speaker of the Majlis' visit to Beirut send?

The Speaker of the Majlis' visit to Beirut sent a message of strength to Zionism and its allies, and also conveyed a message of courage to other Axis of Resistance countries and freedom-seeking people of the world. Palestinian and Lebanese people now know who and at what level is their enemy, and at a time when the whole world has abandoned them over fear of the relentless fire of the Zionist regime, what country and at what level is standing by them.
What was the impact of Iran's measures against the Zionists' unbridled violence?

Iran's measures against the Zionists' unbridled violence included Operation True Promise II, the Nasr Friday Prayer led by the Supreme Leader, diplomatic visits by Abbas Araghchi and President Masoud Pezeshkian, and the Speaker of the Majlis' visit to Beirut. These actions sent clear messages of strength and unity, showing that the Zionist regime is not capable of defending itself and that the Islamic Republic of Iran is firmly by the side of the Resistance Front.
What did the Zionists assume about the Resistance Front's response?

The Zionists assumed that the Resistance Front had become passive, which led them to begin talking about bigger assassinations and opening new fronts. They thought that they had cut off the connection between the Resistance and the Islamic Republic with the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran and Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut.
What was the purpose of the US's role as a broker in the negotiations?

The US, which was playing from behind the Zionists, had assumed the role of broker in the negotiations and tried to delay the response of the Resistance Front with false promises. They thought that the Resistance Front had become passive and began talking about bigger assassinations and opening new fronts.
What did the Zionists do after Operation True Promise II?

After Operation True Promise II, the Zionists threw in the towel after several acts of strength by Iran. They now only prance about in the fields of blind assassinations and baseless propaganda, which will soon lose their effectiveness and expose their empty hand to the world.
